subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Snowfirel/Mom_saying_my_name.wav 
  Uploaded by : snowfirel <SnowfireL@...> 
  Description : Ok, lets hope this works, thanks to Kristin, she sent me her 'Golden wave, which helped me to cut this 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Snowfirel/Mom_saying_my_name.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

snowfirel <SnowfireL@...>
